attributes.action: Referendum instead of parliament debates for all public matters.
attributes.additional_details: Many recent public polls don't reflect the outcome of in parliament votes (ie assisted dying, fracking). This shows the government isn't representing the public, but their own interests. It's time policies and laws represent the country and its people, not just benefitting the few.
attributes.background: Instead of having votes in parliament on issues regarding the public, a referendum should be held instead. The government is meant to represent us. However it's time for us to represent ourselves.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108427

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
